message.content:
cs.DC, cs.AI, cs.NA, cs.CE, cs.SC 

This paper involves the implementation of a GPU-accelerated algorithm for radio interferometer measurement equations in support of Bayesian inference for radio observations. This involves parallel computation and iterative evaluation, which are common in the field of distributed computing (cs.DC). Additionally, the Bayesian inference technique used in this paper falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also involves numerical analysis and optimization, which are relevant to the categories of numerical analysis (cs.NA) and computational engineering (cs.CE). Finally, the paper involves performance evaluation and optimization, which are relevant to the category of scientific computing (cs.SC).
